attributes.action: Pay all Electric Vehicle Owners the equivalent in road tax saved by not driving a Gas Guzzler
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are a few of us who are following govmint advice in driving cleaner ecconomic vehicles powered by electricity. These vehicles are often second user and old and require a huge amount spent on them to keep them roadworthy and in fine condition. Since we are saving the planet - it seems single handedly - then owners should be compensated to assist with saving all this carbon.
